response.original_title: Yer Çekimli Aşklar: Ona Sevdiğimi Söyle
response.overview: Cemal, who went to Germany, leaves his wife with his conservative family. The young woman, who is under great pressure, looks for economic freedom and ends up in a brothel and starts working there. Cemal, on the other hand, is given a gun and said to his wife, "Clean your honor," despite his family. He takes off his wedding ring and gives it to the food, he says "Tell Him I Love You".
response.title: Yer Çekimli Aşklar: Ona Sevdiğimi Söyle
